mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS evaluationId, e.course_id AS courseId, c.course_name AS courseName, u.name AS teacher, e.content_evaluation AS contentEvaluation, e.service_evaluation AS serviceEvaluation, e.attitude_evaluation AS attitudeEvaluation, e.effect_evaluation AS effectEvaluation, e.comment AS evaluationContent FROM course_evaluation e LEFT JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN users u ON c.teacher_id = u.uid WHERE e.course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_evaluation ( course_id, content_evaluation, service_evaluation, attitude_evaluation, effect_evaluation, comment ) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{contentEvaluation}, #{serviceEvaluation}, #{attitudeEvaluation}, #{effectEvaluation}, #{evaluationContent} )
